name: Security Officer
description: On-site security officers — often referred to simply as guards — at Foundation facilities are tasked with maintaining physical and information security for Foundation projects, operations, and personnel.

name: MTF - Mobile Task Force
description: Specialist units comprised of veteran field personnel drawn from all over the Foundation.

name: Class D
description: Class D personnel are expendable personnel used to handle extremely hazardous anomalies. Typically drawn worldwide from the ranks of prison inmates convicted of violent crimes, especially those on death row.

name: Researcher
description: Researchers are the scientific branch of the Foundation, drawn from the ranks of the smartest and best-trained research scientists from around the world. The goal of the Foundation's research projects is to gain a better understanding of unexplained anomalies and how they operate

name: SCP-173
description: Euclid. Made of concrete and rebar. Extremely hostile. Cannot move within line of sight, but will attack and snap the neck when not watched.

name: SCP-106
description: Keter. SCP-106 appears to be an elderly humanoid, with a general appearance of advanced decomposition. He is able to “vanish” inside solid matter, entering what is assumed to be a form of “pocket dimension” where usually drags his prey and plays with them until satisfied.
